item.title: The Shop Course Series is Out Now

item.description: This month’s course update wraps up the UI arc of the project. item.title: Godot Interface Design Course: standalone version
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: If you don’t have the full Godot 3 course and you are only interested in UI design, you can now get our UI master series as a stand-alone course! That way you only pay for the content you want! ðŸ˜Š This initial release contains 25 tutorials, for over 3h30 of content. You’ll learn to create: A pause menu and manage pause An inventory system you can use for any type of game An item menu inspired by old-school Japanese RPGs Animated lifebars and gauges that follow monsters in the game Get the Godot UI Tutorial!

item.title: GUI and Inventory tutorials: Godot course release 10
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: The UI course update is up! That’s the biggest monthly release to date ðŸ˜Š These 3.5 hours of extra tutorials dedicated to Game User Interface will show you: How to separate the UI code from the gameplay, using the node tree, signals, and yield features How to design reusable UI components with Godot’s theme system How to create an inventory system and item menu The first UI chapter is in both the Indie and Pro versions of the course.
